name: Hold Portal
target: one portal, up to 20 sq. ft./level
text:
This spell magically holds shut a door, gate, window, or shutter of wood, metal, or stone. The magic affects the portal just as if it were securely closed and normally locked. A knock spell or a successful dispel magic spell can negate a hold portal spell.

Add 5 to the normal DC for forcing open a portal affected by this spell.
mythicText: The target portal can be as large as 30 square feet per caster level. A creature attempting to force open the portal must first succeed at a Will save against the spell’s DC. This is a mindaffecting effect. Failure means the creature can’t open the door while the spell is in effect.
target_zh: 一个入口，面积至多为每等级20平方尺
text_zh:
该法术可以用魔力关一个门、大门、窗户、百叶窗，无论这些入口是由木头、金属还是石头制造都可以。被法术影响的入口就如同紧闭并正常上锁一般。‘敲击术 (knock)’或是成功的‘解除魔法 (dispel magic)’可以抵消该法术。

对于被该法术影响的门来说，破门DC要在正常基础上增加5点。
mythicText_zh: 目标入口可以达到每施法者等级30平方尺的大小。尝试让入口开启的生物必须先要成功进行意志豁免对抗法术的DC。这是影响心灵效果。失败意味着该名生物无法在法术生效期间打开门。
